title: Can anyone goide me aboyt this logo
content:

Seriously though, I don't know if a lot of people on this forum could answer your question, as this is about type. Your enquiry isn't. There's probably sites dedicated to this stuff, try google. Good luck.

Is it the red rose of Lancashire? I'm more familiar with the white Yorkshire one, but there are similarities.
